Posts.Content: Nov 22, 2011 05:12PM Ruth2011 wrote: I am 3 months post rads and still tired. I thought it was from the tamoxifen, but not sure what causes the fatigue. how do we know????? I stopped the T after 7 weeks to test it out and see if it goes away. Does anyone have this same experience?
Posts.Title: How long after rads do you stop feeling tired? bedo Cyborg
